emerging_technologies.name: AI-Driven Predictive Healthcare
emerging_technologies.description: Utilizes AI to predict health risks and diseases before symptoms manifest, enabling preemptive treatments.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could reduce healthcare costs, increase life expectancy, but raises privacy and ethical concerns regarding data usage.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires integration with existing health systems, regulatory approval, and public trust in AI for personal health.

emerging_technologies.name: Quantum-Resistant Blockchain
emerging_technologies.description: A blockchain architecture designed to withstand attacks from quantum computers, ensuring long-term security.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Enhances security in digital transactions, but requires a significant overhaul of current blockchain systems.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Industry consensus, need for standardization, and investment in new cryptographic algorithms.

emerging_technologies.name: Neural-Link Interfaces
emerging_technologies.description: Non-invasive or minimally invasive brain-computer interfaces for direct communication between the human brain and machines.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential for enhanced human abilities, but ethical concerns about privacy, autonomy, and potential for misuse.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Technological breakthroughs in neural technology, public acceptance, and regulatory frameworks.

emerging_technologies.name: Eco-Sustainable Urban Farming
emerging_technologies.description: High-yield, low-resource urban farming systems integrated into city landscapes, reducing food miles and waste.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Improves food security and reduces carbon footprint, but requires urban policy changes and community acceptance.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Cost-effectiveness, local government incentives, and public demand for local produce.

mainstream_technologies.name: Fully Autonomous Vehicles
mainstream_technologies.description: Vehicles capable of navigating roads without human intervention, becoming a common sight in urban environments.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread adoption in certain cities, with infrastructure adjustments for smart traffic management.

mainstream_technologies.name: AI Personal Assistants
mainstream_technologies.description: AI assistants integrated into daily life, managing schedules, communications, and providing real-time information.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Almost ubiquitous, with significant integration into smart homes, personal devices, and workplaces.

epoch_themes.description: An era where automation and AI deeply penetrate every aspect of life, from healthcare to transportation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Increased efficiency and personalization but also potential job displacement and privacy concerns.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Global competition in AI development, ethical AI framework discussions, and regulatory changes.

epoch_themes.description: A shift towards technologies that support sustainable living and environmental conservation.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes environmental awareness but requires significant lifestyle changes and governmental support.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased focus on green technology, carbon neutrality goals, and urban sustainability initiatives.
